dashboard.label: Application Performance Overview
dashboard.description: A dashboard providing insights into application performance and health.

panels.title: Requests per Minute
panels.description: Shows the rate of incoming requests.

search.query: index=main sourcetype=access_combined | timechart count by _time span=1m

panels.title: Error Rate
panels.description: Displays the percentage of error responses.

search.query: index=main sourcetype=access_combined status>=500 | stats count as errors | eval total = [search index=main sourcetype=access_combined | stats count] | eval error_rate=round((errors/total)*100,2)

panels.title: Average Response Time
panels.description: Measures the average time taken to process requests.

search.query: index=main sourcetype=access_combined | stats avg(response_time) as avg_rt | eval avg_rt=round(avg_rt,2)

panels.title: Top 10 Slowest Endpoints
panels.description: Lists the endpoints with the highest average response times.

search.query: index=main sourcetype=access_combined | stats avg(response_time) as avg_rt by uri | sort -avg_rt | head 10

panels.title: Server CPU Utilization
panels.description: Displays the CPU utilization across all servers.

search.query: index=os sourcetype=cpu | timechart avg(percentIdle) as idle by host span=1m | eval cpu_utilization=100-idle

panels.title: Recent Error Logs
panels.description: Shows the most recent error logs.
